name: Youth of the European People's Party
goal:
Act as the European-level umbrella organization of center-right youth organizations.

Act as the youth organization of the European Peopleâ€™s Party and the EPP Group in the European Parliament.

Organise the exchange of information and practices between the member organizations.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
In 2018, YEPP adopted a new political agenda "A stronger Europe in a changing world". As Europe is facing crises on every front from migration, climate change, trade policies and Eurosceptism, we strive to be the youth voice for the centre-right on all issues facing Europe. It is our aim to create concrete policies in relation to these issues.

While of course, we have a focus on youth issues other major topics for YEPP are:
-Digital Agenda
-Climate and Environment
-Job Creation
-Trade policy
-Youth Policies
